page_content: The page provides instructions on how to use a mapping application.
The page provides a guide on how to submit a request for a cultural project in the area of early childhood education.
The page provides information on parental fees for day schools and mentions kiBon, a software for administration of these fees.
The page outlines the ICT standards set by the cantonal administration for the use of software solutions and platforms.
The page provides information for municipalities on how to review data related to land use planning, noise sensitivity levels, and other topics via a Pr√ºfkarte.
The page serves as a hub for alarm systems, providing guides and information on various software like WinFAP, eAlarmPush, and DiCal.
The page provides a guide on how to conduct research in the online inventory of the State Archives.
